General.Name: Sagaliam Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Sagaliam Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to identify target business in the telecommunications, media, and technology industries. Sagaliam Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 1800 Avenue of the Stars, Los Angeles, CA, United States, 90067
